author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Madras High Court Bench here on Monday extended till February 4 an interim order passed by it on December 29 restraining Thanjavur East police from arresting Desiya Murpokku Dravida Kazhagam president Vijayakant in a case booked against him and his party men for allegedly damaging an All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam hoarding.

Justice V.M. Velumani extended the interim order since the prosecution sought time for the appearance of State Public Prosecutor S. Shanmugavelayutham to contest the plea.
title: Bail plea adjourned
